languages.text: "Сие утверждение истинное. Мироздание перестало существовать очень давно, оно обратилось в ничто, пепел. Все, что осталось — эти руины. Последний обломок вселенной, ее кенотаф".
"This statement is true. The world ceased to exist a very long time ago. It turned to nothingness. To ashes. All that's left are these ruins. The last shard of the universe. Its cenotaph."
languages.original_text: "Сие утверждение истинное. Мироздание перестало существовать очень давно, оно обратилось в ничто, пепел. Все, что осталось — эти руины. Последний обломок вселенной, ее кенотаф".

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true. The world ceased to exist a very long time ago. It turned to nothingness. To ashes. All that's left are these ruins. The last shard of the universe. Its cenotaph."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: 「その発言は正しい。この惑星はずいぶん昔に存在することをやめた。無になった。灰になった。残ったのはこうした廃墟だけだ。宇宙の最後のかけら。その慰霊碑だ」
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The world ceased to exist a very long time ago. It turned to nothingness. To ashes. All that's left are these ruins. The last shard of the universe. Its cenotaph."

traits.locale_text: 「その発言は正しい。この惑星はずいぶん昔に存在することをやめた。無になった。灰になった。残ったのはこうした廃墟だけだ。宇宙の最後のかけら。その慰霊碑だ」
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的。世界很久以前就不复存在了。它化作了虚无、灰烬。只剩下这些废墟。这是宇宙最后的碎片，也是它的墓碑。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The world ceased to exist a very long time ago. It turned to nothingness. To ashes. All that's left are these ruins. The last shard of the universe. Its cenotaph."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是正确的。世界很久以前就不复存在了。它化作了虚无、灰烬。只剩下这些废墟。这是宇宙最后的碎片，也是它的墓碑。”
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. Le monde a cessé d'exister il y a bien longtemps. Il n'est plus que néant. Cendres. Il n'en reste que ces ruines. Le dernier fragment de l'univers. Son cénotaphe. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The world ceased to exist a very long time ago. It turned to nothingness. To ashes. All that's left are these ruins. The last shard of the universe. Its cenotaph."

traits.locale_text: « Affirmatif. Le monde a cessé d'exister il y a bien longtemps. Il n'est plus que néant. Cendres. Il n'en reste que ces ruines. Le dernier fragment de l'univers. Son cénotaphe. »
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: «Esta declaración es verdadera. El mundo dejó de existir hace mucho tiempo. Se convirtió en nada, en cenizas, dejando nada más que estas ruinas. El último fragmento del universo. Su cenotafio».
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The world ceased to exist a very long time ago. It turned to nothingness. To ashes. All that's left are these ruins. The last shard of the universe. Its cenotaph."

traits.locale_text: «Esta declaración es verdadera. El mundo dejó de existir hace mucho tiempo. Se convirtió en nada, en cenizas, dejando nada más que estas ruinas. El último fragmento del universo. Su cenotafio».
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Die Welt hat schon vor langer Zeit aufgehört zu existieren. Sie hat sich in Nichts verwandelt. In Asche. Es sind nur noch diese Ruinen übrig. Der letzte Splitter des Universums. Ihr Kenotaph."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The world ceased to exist a very long time ago. It turned to nothingness. To ashes. All that's left are these ruins. The last shard of the universe. Its cenotaph."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Die Welt hat schon vor langer Zeit aufgehört zu existieren. Sie hat sich in Nichts verwandelt. In Asche. Es sind nur noch diese Ruinen übrig. Der letzte Splitter des Universums. Ihr Kenotaph."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Bu önerme doğru. Dünya, var olmayı uzun süre önce bıraktı. Hiçliğe, küle dönüştü. Yalnızca bu harabeler kaldı. Evrenin son parçacıkları. Mezar taşları."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The world ceased to exist a very long time ago. It turned to nothingness. To ashes. All that's left are these ruins. The last shard of the universe. Its cenotaph."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme doğru. Dünya var olmayı uzun süre önce bıraktı. Hiçliğe dönüştü. Küle. Yalnızca bu harabeler kaldı. Evrenin son parçacıkları. Mezar taşları."
traits.speaker: Chief
